body: This section details several standard organizations, the cost of creating them, and which teams from the downtime system you can recruit to form them. Unless you own a building where these people can reside, they have their own homes.
name: Organizations
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations

sections.body: Artisans and assistants who create quality goods.
sections.name: Artisans' Guild
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Artisans Guild

sections.body: Fighters trained to find and capture criminals and escapees.
sections.name: Bounty Hunters
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Bounty Hunters

sections.body: A gang of well-armed professionals who throw their weight around on your behalf.
sections.name: Brute Squad
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Brute Squad

sections.body: A study group of peers and apprentices devoted to arcane mysteries and research.
sections.name: Cabal
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Cabal

sections.body: Travelers skilled in loading, transporting, and unloading trade goods from animals, wagons, and ships.
sections.name: Caravan Crew
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Caravan Crew

sections.body: A splinter religion or secret society that believes yours is the true faith.
sections.name: Cult
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Cult

sections.body: Friends and toadies who take care of your eating, sleeping, travel, and entertainment arrangements.
sections.name: Entourage
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Entourage

sections.body: A possibly illegal association of boxing aficionados.
sections.name: Fight Club
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Fight Club

sections.body: The necessary guides and assistants for sport hunting.
sections.name: Hunting Party
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Hunting Party

sections.body: A well-armed group of warriors who are loyal to you, and who are paid to guard or fight.
sections.name: Mercenary Company
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Mercenary Company

sections.body: The crew of a small sailing vessel.
sections.name: Ship Crew
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Ship Crew

sections.body: Performers, set dressers, and costumers for an acting troupe or similar group.
sections.name: Theater Company
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Theater Company

sections.body: A band of criminals and thugs who commit illegal acts.
sections.name: Thieves' Guild
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Thieves Guild

sections.body: Unsavory wanderers skilled at stage magic, fortunetelling, rigged games, and snake oil.
sections.name: Vagabonds
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Organizations/Vagabonds
sections.teams: 1 Acolyte, 1 Apprentice, 1 Cutpurses, 2 Drivers, 1 Guards, 1 Laborers, 1 Scofflaws
